thread.title: Sensex Ends Flat; HDFC, Infosys Gain
thread.title_full: Sensex Ends Flat; HDFC, Infosys Gain

title: Sensex Ends Flat; HDFC, Infosys Gain
text:
Nifty 7,789.30 1.20 [0.02%] Leading the set of gainers from the Nifty were heavyweight stocks like Infosys and HDFC. Cairn India lost a huge 4 per cent after crude oil prices continued to fall.
Tata Motors fell 4 per cent, after a good rally seen in the last few trading sessions. The company reported flat vehicle sales growth for the month of Aug 2015. 
Shares in Amtek Auto surged 50 per cent after the promoters decided to infuse fresh capital into the company. 
Wonder La also gained ground after the company inked a deal with the Government of Tamil Nadu for setting up an amusement park. 
Infosys saw good buying support after the company announced a partnership with the Association of Tennis Professionals. 
Mid cap stocks also ended the day with gains with stocks like Crisil and Marico jumping a huge 3 per cent in trade. 
Meanwhile, markets in Europe were trading with losses, while most of Asia closed the day lower. 
GoodReturns.in
